title: Add instant delivery products to catalog

requirements.text: Add a new boolean field 'isInstant' to the Product type in the backend to indicate whether a product is available for instant delivery
acceptanceCriteria: Product type in backend/main.mo includes an 'isInstant' field of type Bool
Existing products can be updated to set isInstant to true or false

requirements.text: Update all existing dairy products in the product catalog to have instant delivery enabled (isInstant = true)
acceptanceCriteria: All products (milk, curd, paneer, butter, ghee) have isInstant set to true
Products can be queried to filter by instant delivery availability

requirements.text: Display an 'Instant Delivery' badge or indicator on product cards for products that have instant delivery enabled
acceptanceCriteria: ProductCard component shows a visible instant delivery badge when product.isInstant is true
Badge uses appropriate styling consistent with the earthy theme
Badge is positioned prominently on the product card without obscuring other information

constraints: Preserve existing product catalog structure and data
Do not modify immutable frontend paths (hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, hooks/useActor.ts, main.tsx, components/ui)
nonGoals: Implementing actual instant delivery logistics or timing
Adding separate instant delivery checkout flow
Charging different prices for instant delivery
Creating a delivery time selection interface
